rules:
Type `,play` in chat and the bot will play a random kpop song in VC. The goal of this game is to be the first person to guess the song name in chat. [Join our official KMQ server for more help!](https://discord.gg/RCuzwYV). Use `,help [command]` to get more details about a command.
[Click here to see more details about how to play.](https://brainicism.github.io/KMQ_Discord/GAMEPLAY)
 [Click here to see frequently asked questions.](https://brainicism.github.io/KMQ_Discord/FAQ)
